Title: LogAnalyser
Desc: A robust web application leveraging the ELK stack to monitor and alert users about server logs, ensuring proactive management and issue resolution.
TagLine: LogAnalyser: Decoding the Language of Servers for Smarter Operations.
stack: NextJs , Postman , Python , AWS , SQL , gRPC , Socket

Title: MedXRIH
Desc: An integrated web and android platform connecting doctors, patients, and pharmacies, streamlining healthcare communication and services.
TagLine: MedXRIH: Nurturing Health through Digital Harmony.
stack: React , React Native , MongoDb , NodeJs , Postman

Title: Ignitia
Desc: A dynamic website designed for a college cultural fest, providing information, updates, and an interactive platform for participants.
TagLine: Ignite the Cultural Spark: Ignitia Unleashed!

Title: WebRTC
Desc: A cutting-edge web application enabling real-time communication among users, fostering seamless interactions over the internet.
TagLine: WebRTC: Bridging the Digital Divide, One Conversation at a Time.

Title: ChatX
Desc: A feature-rich web application facilitating real-time communication and chat storage, reminiscent of popular messaging apps like WhatsApp.

Title: SpaceXClone
Desc: A meticulous recreation of the SpaceX website, offering users an immersive experience akin to the original.
